metadata.name: Burn Ticket
metadata.description:
FTRArray // The first release in our collection is a burn ticket for our main event, giving you the opportunity to own one-of-a-kind, professionally shot and curated vintage 35mm film. This is the first time these negatives have been brought to the blockchain, making them truly unique. Don't miss out on your chance to own a piece of history. Mint your burn ticket today! 

We all have those embarrassing hidden folder mints from last year. These iconic images will NOT BE THOSE.
